name: fat_mat_tableize
description: Make tables for AFNI group analysis programs from 3dNetCorr (*.netcc) and 3dTrackID (*.grid) outputs, with optional additional subject information from CSV files.
author: AFNI Developers

inputs.name: Input Matrices
inputs.description: Names of *.netcc or *.grid files with matrices to be used to make table; can be provided using wildcard chars.

inputs.name: Input CSV
inputs.description: Name of a CSV file to include in the table. The first column must have subject ID labels that match with the input matrix files.

inputs.name: Input List File
inputs.description: File containing paths to subject matrices and optionally CSV IDs for matching.

inputs.name: Output Prefix
inputs.description: Output basename for the table and log files. Suffix and file extensions will be added for the outputs.

inputs.name: List of Parameters
inputs.description: List of matrices to be included in the table, identified by their parameter name.

inputs.name: Show Date
inputs.description: Display release/editing date of current version.

inputs.name: Show Help in Editor
inputs.description: Display help in a separate text editor.

output-files.description: Table file usable in AFNI group analysis programs.
output-files.name: Table File

output-files.description: Log file reporting inputs, matching, and aspects of creating the table file.
output-files.name: Log File
